subject: Re: Classes requiring input from the terminal
msgSnippet: ... So I have.  The file is consoletester.zip , and contains the utility class itself (ConsoleTester), its unit tests, a simple console application, and a
messageBody:
I wrote:
> > Eric Herman and I wrote a (very simple)
> > ConsoleTester utility
> > class to facilitate this sort of testing. If
> > anyone's interested,
> > I could upload the code to the files section of this
> > group...?

Meraj Khan <merajak@y...> replied:
> Please do that.

So I have. The file is "consoletester.zip", and contains the
utility class itself (ConsoleTester), its unit tests,
a simple console application, and a test for the simple app that
uses ConsoleTester.

Hope someone finds some use from it!

Cheers,

-bn
